TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RestrictionsManager extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a mechanism for apps to query restrictions imposed by an entity that manages the user.

Docs.summary: Returns any available set of application-specific restrictions applicable to this application.
Docs.value: the application restrictions as a Bundle. Returns null if there are no restrictions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Android.OS.Bundle ConvertRestrictionsToBundle(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Content.RestrictionEntry> entries) cil managed
Public Shared Function ConvertRestrictionsToBundle (entries As IList(Of RestrictionEntry)) As Bundle

Docs.summary:
Converts a list of restrictions to the corresponding bundle, using the following mapping:
RestrictionEntryBundle
RestrictionEntry#TYPE_BOOLEANBundle#putBoolean
RestrictionEntry#TYPE_CHOICE, RestrictionEntry#TYPE_MULTI_SELECT Bundle#putStringArray
RestrictionEntry#TYPE_INTEGERBundle#putInt
RestrictionEntry#TYPE_STRINGBundle#putString
RestrictionEntry#TYPE_BUNDLEBundle#putBundle
RestrictionEntry#TYPE_BUNDLE_ARRAY Bundle#putParcelableArray

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Content.RestrictionEntry> GetManifestRestrictions(string packageName) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetManifestRestrictions (packageName As String) As IList(Of RestrictionEntry)

abstract member GetManifestRestrictions : string -> System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Content.RestrictionEntry> override this.GetManifestRestrictions : string -> System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Content.RestrictionEntry>

Docs.param: The application for which to fetch the restrictions list.
Docs.summary: Parse and return the list of restrictions defined in the manifest for the specified package, if any.
Docs.returns: The list of RestrictionEntry objects created from the XML file specified in the manifest, or null if none was specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void RequestPermission (string? requestType, string? requestId, Android.OS.PersistableBundle? request);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RequestPermission(string requestType, string requestId, class Android.OS.PersistableBundle request) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub RequestPermission (requestType As String, requestId As String, request As PersistableBundle)
public: virtual void RequestPermission(System::String ^ requestType, System::String ^ requestId, Android::OS::PersistableBundle ^ request);
abstract member RequestPermission : string * string * Android.OS.PersistableBundle -> unit override this.RequestPermission : string * string * Android.OS.PersistableBundle -> unit

Docs.param: The type of request. The type could be one of the predefined types specified here or a custom type that the specific Restrictions Provider might understand. For custom types, the type name should be namespaced to avoid collisions with predefined types and types specified by other Restrictions Providers.
A unique id generated by the app that contains sufficient information to identify the parameters of the request when it receives the id in the response.
A PersistableBundle containing the data corresponding to the specified request type. The keys for the data in the bundle depend on the request type.
Docs.summary: Called by an application to request permission for an operation.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
